salom22: Your personal UK address for shopping
salom23: With us you get two addresses in the UK! We have two warehouses for receiving parcels - in London and Manchester. Indicate in the store the one to which sending will cost less (or the purchase will be tax-free). More often In total, our clients order clothes and shoes in London, and gadgets and everything else go to Manchester. With OkeyPost, you always get the maximum benefit! When delivering from the UK to Russia, all your goods are necessarily insured. Reception of parcels at our warehouse, their processing, removal of excess ones. boxes, storage for up to 70 days - we are completely free. We also combine parcels from different stores into one free of charge. This is necessary to reduce the cost of delivering parcels from the UK to Russia.

salom35: Shopping in the UK is very easy
salom36: English stores do not deliver to Russia, but this is not a problem. With OkeyPost you can buy at the best prices and save on delivery. We will receive your parcels, pack them securely and send them to your home.
salom37: Okeypost will help you pretend to be an American and not overpay. To do this, you need to register in our service. After registration, you will have access to two addresses in England, which you can indicate when placing orders in online stores.

salom41: We monitor the movement of the parcel to the warehouse
salom42: After placing an order, the store will send the tracking number of the parcel to your e-mail and send the items to our warehouse. In 5-7 days, the purchases will arrive to us, we will place them in a special storage facility assigned to your account.
salom43: We pay for delivery and purchases are sent home
salom44: We will notify you when your purchases arrive at the warehouse. You can order something else in other stores and send everything in one parcel (this is more profitable). Purchases will be stored for free for up to 30 days. When all the goods have arrived at the warehouse, choose a delivery method, we will pack everything securely and send it to you, providing the tracking number.
salom45: We have received the parcel and are in a hurry to place a new order
salom46: In about 2 weeks, the parcel will arrive at your home, at the order pick-up point or at the post office. We receive your purchases and rejoice :)
